thread.title: Here's what we'll miss about 'America's Next Top Model'
thread.title_full: Here's what we'll miss about 'America's Next Top Model' - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Here's what we'll miss about 'America's Next Top Model'
text:

Image 1 of 46 "America's Next Top Model" is ending after 22 cycles of smizing, tooching and drama. Here are some of the things we'll miss. "America's Next Top Model" is ending after 22 cycles of smizing, tooching and drama. Here are some of the things we'll miss. Image 2 of 46 Smize Smile with your eyes. Admit it, you've tried it. Smize Smile with your eyes. Admit it, you've tried it. Image 3 of 46 Photo shoots with deadly animals Cycle 1 winner Adrianne Curry ain't afraid of no snake. Photo shoots with deadly animals Cycle 1 winner Adrianne Curry ain't afraid of no snake. Image 4 of 46 Cycle 3 winner Eva Pigford was terrified of this tarantula. But her photo? Flawless. Cycle 3 winner Eva Pigford was terrified of this tarantula. But her photo? Flawless. Photo: BILL DIODATO, UPN Image 5 of 46 Not deadly, but Tyra also used animals that looked like their respective models in Cycle 22. Not deadly, but Tyra also used animals that looked like their respective models in Cycle 22. Tyra showing them how it's done Like when she posed like a doll and made us all remember the "Life Size" movie. Hurry up with that sequel! Fabio I almost forgot they posed with the romance novel cover God. Because it was years after he was actually relevant. Image 11 of 46 Models on toilet bowls. Fashion, baby. Models on toilet bowls. Fashion, baby. Photo: Douglas Fredman Image 12 of 46 Houston in the mix Hadassah Richardson, currently on Cycle 22, has proven one of the most successful local contestants. Photo: Melissa Phillip, Staff Image 13 of 46 Makeovers Cassandra Whitehead of Houston looked like this when she arrived. Makeovers Cassandra Whitehead of Houston looked like this when she arrived. Image 14 of 46 And then she looked like this. When Tyra wanted to cut it shorter, Cassandra exited stage left. And then she looked like this. When Tyra wanted to cut it shorter, Cassandra exited stage left. Photo: The CW Image 15 of 46 Beard weaves Denzel Wells from Houston was the first and only recipient. Beard weaves Denzel Wells from Houston was the first and only recipient. Photo: Franco Lacosta, Pottle Productions Inc Image 16 of 46 Yeah, he looks thrilled with it. Yeah, he looks thrilled with it. Photo: --, STR Image 17 of 46 Truly stunning photos Still in love with this shot of Cycle 2 winner Yoanna House. Truly stunning photos Still in love with this shot of Cycle 2 winner Yoanna House. Image 18 of 46 Danielle Evans shows why she won Cycle 6. Beautiful. Danielle Evans shows why she won Cycle 6. Beautiful. Photo: The CW Image 19 of 46 Cycle 9's Heather Kuzmich took gorgeous photos. Cycle 9's Heather Kuzmich took gorgeous photos. Photo: Matthew Jordan Smith, Pottle Productions Inc Image 20 of 46 Man candy Tyra finally started allowing guys in Cycle 20. And we are thankful. Man candy Tyra finally started allowing guys in Cycle 20. And we are thankful. Photo: Massimo Campana, Pottle Productions Inc Image 21 of 46 In fact, Keith Carlos won Cycle 21. In fact, Keith Carlos won Cycle 21. Photo: Massimo Campana, Pottle Productions Inc Image 22 of 46 Cycle 22 gave us Justin Kim. Gone too soon. Cycle 22 gave us Justin Kim. Gone too soon. Image 23 of 46 Breakout stars Cycle 3's Yaya DaCosta starred as Whitney Houston in the Lifetime original movie "Whitney." Breakout stars Cycle 3's Yaya DaCosta starred as Whitney Houston in the Lifetime original movie "Whitney." Photo: Jack Zeman Image 24 of 46 Plus-size models Cycle 10's Whitney Thompson was the first plus-size winner. Plus-size models Cycle 10's Whitney Thompson was the first plus-size winner. Image 25 of 46 Panic attacks Remember that time Don Benjamin freaked when he had to go underwater? Good times. Panic attacks Remember that time Don Benjamin freaked when he had to go underwater? Diversity Tyra has been very vocal about inclusion and diversity throughout the show. Photo: Patrick Wymore, The CW Image 27 of 46 She staged a gay marriage for one photo shoot. She staged a gay marriage for one photo shoot. Photo: Douglas Friedman, Pottle Productions Inc Image 28 of 46 Transgender model Isis King made the "All Stars" season and has gone on to work with several A-list designers. Transgender model Isis King made the "All Stars" season and has gone on to work with several A-list designers. Photo: MICHAEL DESMOND, THE CW/ASSOCIATED PRESS Image 29 of 46 Chantelle, a model with vitiligo, is redefining beauty standards thanks to the show. Chantelle, a model with vitiligo, is redefining beauty standards thanks to the show. Photo: An Le, Pottle Productions Inc Image 30 of 46 And then, of course, there's this "role reversal." Oh, Tyra. And then, of course, there's this "role reversal." Oh, Tyra. Photo: Patrick Wymore, The CW Image 31 of 46 Crazytown models Cycle 19's Victoria is a hall of famer for her social awkwardness, odd relationship with her mom and ability to take fierce photos. Crazytown models Cycle 19's Victoria is a hall of famer for her social awkwardness, odd relationship with her mom and ability to take fierce photos. Photo: Patrick Wymore, The CW Image 32 of 46 Cycle 14's Angelea Preston went on to 2011's "All Stars," where she made the finals. But she was mysteriously disqualified with no explanation. She later revealed it was because of her past as an escort. Cycle 14's Angelea Preston went on to 2011's "All Stars," where she made the finals. But she was mysteriously disqualified with no explanation. She later revealed it was because of her past as an escort. Photo: Mike Ruiz, Pottle Productions Inc Image 33 of 46 And we will never, ever forget Jade and her Jade-isms . "Biracial butterfly." "This is not 'America's Top Best Friend!'" And her "rap" against Furonda. Timeless. And we will never, ever forget Jade and her Jade-isms . "Biracial butterfly." "This is not 'America's Top Best Friend!'" And her "rap" against Furonda. Timeless. Photo: The CW Image 34 of 46 Random guest models Like Zendaya, who worked the camera. Random guest models Like Zendaya, who worked the camera. Photo: The CW Image 35 of 46 And we're certainly not complaining when Alex Minsky shows up. And we're certainly not complaining when Alex Minsky shows up. Photo: Patrick Wymore Image 36 of 46 Miss J Babyyy , she needs her own reality show. We can't let that runway walk go to waste. Miss J Babyyy , she needs her own reality show. We can't let that runway walk go to waste. Photo: The CW Image 37 of 46 Noted fashion photographer Nigel Barker Sigh. Noted fashion photographer Nigel Barker Sigh. Photo: Stephen Lovekin, Getty Images For IMG Image 38 of 46 Janice Dickinson, the world's first supermodel. And one of the greatest reality TV villains of all time. Janice Dickinson, the world's first supermodel. And one of the greatest reality TV villains of all time. Image 39 of 46 Andre Leon Talley He coined the term "dreckitude," showcased an array of designer mumus. Andre Leon Talley He coined the term "dreckitude," showcased an array of designer mumus. Photo: Charley Gallay, Getty Images For Diane Von Furst Image 40 of 46 The judging panel "I only have two photos in my hands ..." The judging panel "I only have two photos in my hands ..." Image 41 of 46 Ridiculous outfits Like this Christmas bow worn by Cycle 22's Nyle DiMarco. What's sign language for "dreckitude?" Ridiculous outfits Like this Christmas bow worn by Cycle 22's Nyle DiMarco. What's sign language for "dreckitude?" Photo: Aaron Epstein, ÃÂ© 2015 The CW Network, LLC. All Rights Reserved Image 42 of 46 Tooch and booch Tyra made up words almost every cycle. Among her finest were tooch, a booty pop; and booch, the male version. Yeah, I don't know. Tooch and booch Tyra made up words almost every cycle. Among her finest were tooch, a booty pop; and booch, the male version. Yeah, I don't know. Photo: Chris Frawley, The CW Image 43 of 46 Music videos Allison Harvard, a Houston native, created the truly stunning " Underwater " song and video. Music videos Allison Harvard, a Houston native, created the truly stunning " Underwater " song and video. Photo: The CW Image 44 of 46 Tyra herself did one called " Shake Ya Body " during Cycle 2. It wasn't terrible and preceded a lot of today's dance-pop diva hits. Tyra herself did one called " Shake Ya Body " during Cycle 2. It wasn't terrible and preceded a lot of today's dance-pop diva hits. Photo: Album Artwork Image 45 of 46 Pot Ledom Now, forever and always. (It's "Top Model" backwards.) Pot Ledom Now, forever and always. (It's "Top Model" backwards.) Photo: The CW Image 46 of 46 Here's what we'll miss about 'America's Next Top Model' 1 / 46 Back to Gallery We're smizing through tears.
The CW confirmed Wednesday that "America's Next Top Model" is ending after 22 seasons. (Cycles, if you're an "ANTM" fan.) The current run, which is down to three guys and three girls, will be its last.
Related: Catch up on what you've missed. Joey Guerra recaps every crazy episode
"Top Model" is quite often ridiculous. But it's also a riotously entertaining, guilty pleasure. There's nothing else quite like it on TV.
Peruse the above gallery for a look at what we'll miss most from Banks and her band of crazies.
